sqlMap.select: /*Member.loginCheck*/ SELECT CAST (COUNT(*) AS VARCHAR(10)) AS CNT ,MAX(AUTH) AS AUTH FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = '$ID$' AND PASSWORD = '$PWD$'
sqlMap.insert: /*Member.insertMachine*/ INSERT INTO MACHINE ( MACHINE_NAME ,DONG ,FLOOR ,PLACE ,GENDER ,PART ,FLAG ) VALUES ( '$MACHINE_NAME$' ,'$DONG$' ,'$FLOOR$' ,(CASE WHEN '$PLACE$'='중앙' THEN 'C' ELSE 'W' END) ,(CASE WHEN '$GENDER$'='남자' THEN 'M' ELSE 'W' END) ,'$PART$' ,'N' )
sqlMap.select: /*Member.selectMachineList*/ SELECT MACHINE_NAME ,DONG ,FLOOR ,(CASE WHEN PLACE='C' THEN '중앙' ELSE '서편' END) AS PLACE ,(CASE WHEN GENDER='M' THEN '남자' ELSE '여자' END) AS GENDER ,PART FROM MACHINE

/*Member.selectNowStatusList*/ SELECT DONG ,FLOOR ,(CASE WHEN PLACE='C' THEN '중앙' ELSE '서편' END) AS PLACE ,(CASE WHEN GENDER='M' THEN '남자' ELSE '여자' END) AS GENDER ,MAX(CASE WHEN PART='1' THEN FLAG ELSE '' END) PART1 ,MAX(CASE WHEN PART='2' THEN FLAG ELSE '' END) PART2 ,MAX(CASE WHEN PART='3' THEN FLAG ELSE '' END) PART3 FROM test.machine GROUP BY DONG ,FLOOR ,PLACE ,GENDER ORDER BY DONG,FLOOR,PLACE,GENDER
/*Member.selectGroupList*/ SELECT DONG, FLOOR FROM MACHINE GROUP BY DONG, FLOOR
sqlMap.update: /*Member.updateStatus*/ UPDATE MACHINE SET FLAG='$FLAG$' WHERE MACHINE_NAME='$MACHINE_NAME$'
